useCase.name: Manage Email Notifications for Summit Attendees
useCase.description: As a Summit Coordinator, I want to send email notifications to attendees of the summit.

successEndConditions.condition: Email notifications are successfully sent to selected attendees.

useCase.trigger: Summit Coordinator initiates the process to send email notifications.

mainSequence.step: Request list of attendees for the summit.
Query attendee details for the summit.
Request to send email to selected attendees.
Send email request with attendee emails.
